meanings.definition: A type of firearm barrel with a constricted bore at the muzzle to control the spread of shot.
meanings.sent1: The hunter used a chokebore to aim more precisely at the target.
meanings.sent2: The chokebore on the shotgun helped improve accuracy during the shooting competition.
meanings.sent3: When the duck saw the chokebore, it knew to fly away quickly!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a chokebore, hitting their mark with precision.
meanings.sent5: The chokebore of the cannon made the enemy troops retreat in fear.

meanings.definition: To bore or drill a hole with a constricted diameter.
meanings.sent1: He had to chokebore the hole carefully to fit the small screw.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter decided to chokebore the wood for a snug fit.
meanings.sent3: As he tried to chokebore the metal, sparks flew everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a chokebore, slowly but surely making progress.
meanings.sent5: The drill bit was designed to chokebore holes in tough materials.
